caption.title: Gap in black spruce climate coverage (A) for mean annual temperature (B) for total annual precipitations
caption.p: The maps show Littleâ€™s range (red border). Shared portions of the range between the modelling area and Little range in dark grey. Gap in coverage in light grey. The boxplot shows the range of precipitation values for Little and for the modelling area.
